column4: psusi, this may be an obvious thing, but its telling me there are three kernels. does it matter which i use? linux-386, linux-image-386, linux-image-2.6.12-9386
linux-image-386 is just a package that installs linux-image-2.6.12-9-386 (the newest kernel)
so should i select the last one? its asking me to pick on
